thread.title: A Third American City Is Now Running Entirely On Renewable Energy
thread.title_full: A Third American City Is Now Running Entirely On Renewable Energy

title: A Third American City Is Now Running Entirely On Renewable Energy
text:
A Third American City Is Now Running Entirely On Renewable Energy 
Climate Progress: The number of American cities that run entirely on renewable energy is growing.Last week, the city of Aspen, Colorado declared it had become the third municipality to receive all of its power from renewable sources. Aspenâ€™s energy portfolio now primarily consists of wind power and hydroelectric, with smaller contributions from solar and geothermal.
